Description_lang: For each damage over time effects on the target, your Mind Flay and Mind Sear have a $m1% chance to trigger a Dark Thought. Dark ThoughtIncreases the number of charges of Mind Blast by 1, Mind Blast has no cooldown and can be cast instantly, and can be cast while channelling Mind Flay or Mind Sear.
AuraDescription_lang: Maximum number of charges of Mind Blast increased by $w1.Mind Blast no longer has a  cooldown, can be cast instantly, and while channelling Mind Flay or Mind Sear.
